Name: Game Of Puzzles: Furry
About the game: Game Of Puzzles: Furry - is a puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces. You need to collect from the small pictures one big and after you may to going at the new level. Features: A range of sizes from 9 to 36 pieces Button to automatically complete the level Auto Saving Simple mouse control Traditional puzzle gameplay Gallery Steam Achievements Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
